issue.title: [JS] Implement logic for combining Vectors with different lengths/chunksizes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4554](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4554). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should add logic to combine and possibly slice/re-chunk and uniformly partition chunks into separate RecordBatches. This will make it easier to create Tables or RecordBatches from Vectors of different lengths. This is also necessary for `Table#assign()`. PR incoming.
